name: Junk Man
description:
Created by Kirsty Angela Smith.

As Junk Man you have 20 seconds to catch as much junk as you possible can to earn your wage. But the stressed and careless customers are throwing valuables out along with the trash! catching those will mean deductions from your final wage.

Good Luck on earning your money!

This game was created as part of the course for a Diploma in Games Design at Futureworks.
